welcomeText: For shopping on Bharat Online Platform, Login with your account
welcomeSignUpText: Welcome! Sign up to continue shopping
signinText: Sign In to your existing account or create a new account
signUpText: Sign up to create an account
termsAndConditionNote: By Continuing, you agree to our Terms of Service Privacy policy Content Policy
agreeTermsCondition: I agree to the terms and conditions
agreeSelfDeclaration: I agree to the self and declaration
deleteAccountMsg2: You are about to submit a request for us to permanently close your Online Bharat account and delete your data. Once your account is closed all of the products and services accessed through your account will no longer be available to you.
deleteAccountMsg3: If you proceed with this request you will not be able to access products and services associated with your closed account, including:
deleteAccountMsg4: Account Closure is a Permanent Action
deleteAccountMsg5: Please note account closure is a permanent action and once your account is closed it will no longer be available to you and cannot be restored. If you decide later that you want to start ordering from us again or if you would like to use products and services that require an account, you will need to create a new account.
confirmCloseAccount: Yes, I want to permanently close my Online Bharat Account and delete my data.
writeNote: write your note up to 250 character
forgotPasswordDescription: Enter your registered mobile number below to receive password reset instructions
verificationDescription: We have sent the verification code to your mobile number
resetPasswordDescription: Udhari Book has sent the verification code to your mobile number and registered email
title: Title
name: Name
placeholderNote: On Clicking Place order button, picked items will be sent to seller or service provider via Order chat. Your order processing will be done from the same window.
instruction1: Delivery Method and Payment for selected items has to be mutually discused and agreed with seller or service provider.
instruction2: Bharat Online doesn't receive payment on anyone behalf and has no involvement in any payment or delivery related issues.
instruction3: Whatever and whenever feasible, opt for secure payment methods.
instruction4: Avoid entering your UPI (Unified Payments Interface) PIN while receiving money.
instruction5: Avoid upfront payments or providing products in advance Report suspicious users to Bharat Online.
helpHeading: Order flow has three stages :New, Processing, Past.
helpInstruction1: New: Newly placed orders waiting for acceptance
helpInstruction4: Every order will go through these stages depending on respective order status In help ?
helpInstruction5: All order status are handled by Seller or Service Provider.
helpInstruction6: Bharat Online has no role in Order Management.
payOnDelivery: Pay on Delivery includes Cash on Delivery (COD) as well as additional digital payment facilities via UPI / QR Code –Scan & Pay
creditDebitCard: Credit/debit cards via mPOS card machine at the Merchant store
paymentMethodNote: Please first ensure the amount printed on the invoice.Ask Merchant’s delivery agent/Service provider to provide a UPI QR code for your shipment or your service order.Scan that QR code using Scan & Pay option from your favourite RBI approved UPI payment service operators Bharat Online provided QR code is NOT meant for any kinds of payment transaction and platform no role in any monetary transaction.
